head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TOBIN, WALLACE EMMETT III (''TOBY'')

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TOBIN, WALLACE EMMETT III (''TOBY'')

block.p: TOBIN--Wallace Emmett III (''Toby''), in Brunswick, Maine on December 31st 2006. Beloved husband of Harriet Rinse Tobin; father of Briggs Tobin, Ridgefield, CT, Ashley Tobin, Orinda, CA, Bliss Tobin, Corning, NY, Matthew Tobin, Chilmark, MA; former husband of Deborah Geldard Tobin, Guilford, CT. Contributions to Sea Education Association, P.O. Box 6, Woods Hole, MA 02543, or Yale Corinthian Yacht Club, c/o Sailing Associates, P.O. Box 208216, New Haven, CT 06520. Condolences can be expressed at: www.brackettfuneralhome .com
